title: Khalid’s surprise
brief_description: Machinima is animating using the 3D real-time virtual worlds of computer games as opposed to the complex, non real-time 3D animation software used by professionals. The game engine used to create this compelling short homage to a highly popular film is Battlefield 2, Battlefield 2: Modern Combat features a propaganda-fuelled single player campaign where gamers play both sides of a conflict in one of the most treacherous regions in the world - Kazakhstan
